entry.title: Goodbye 2022
entry.summary: I am so grateful for everything that I have, and though 2022 has been a trying year for me in its own way, I have no complaints.
entry.content:
I am so grateful for everything that I have, and though 2022 has been a trying year for me in its own way, I have no complaints.

Onwards and upwards, here's to a better year ahead!

entry.title: Merry Christmas 2022
entry.content:
Welcome to my website!

I look forward to documenting some useful notes and resources here.

I will also document a bit about my journey as a software engineer here.
